title: guruvaruL irundAlE
sahitya:
guruvaruL irundAlE karuviruL karaiyumE tiruvaruL vandu niraiyumE manamE


anupallavi

  uruvAna viLakkilE aruvAna minsAram oLirvadu kaNDu nI teLivadu nanmaiyE


caraNam    dAhameDutta pOdE AkAsham pozhiyumO taDangal udaviDumO
mohADavi tANDi mukti kaNDuidiDa munninru naDattiDum tannigharaTra tUya
